name: Cannonball City (horribly unfinished)
description:
I spent like 3 hours on this because i couldn't think of an idea and then got bored with it lol. 

Shoot a cannonball into an infinitely long city with a whopping 6 building types hastily made in GIMP. 

PRESS SPACE TO SHOOT. a AND d to add force to ball. avoid spikebois
